title: Jennifer Walters
author: Jennifer Walters
content: So sad for these young men resourting to Gun Violence and not cool for witness to spread videos   RIP to the young manRight After Takeoff’s Death, Gruesome Videos Spread Like Wildfire https://www.rollingstone.com/music/music-features/takeoffs-shooting-graphic-content-social-media-1234624269/

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Death to me a private matter but with today’s technology, social media shares information instantaneous.I think the videos posted of Takeoff’s murder is unsympathetic. The lack of concern is devastating to family and friends with posting his corpse on social media.Imagine if this happened before 2000, the man could rest in peace and privacy. I wish that people can just stop and think before posting. One should have dignity and respect for family and friends.
